DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety pharmacokinetics/pharmacodynamics co-administration Clomipramine HCl 15mg Sildenafil citrate 100mg compare effect single oral administration Korean healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Drug-Drug Interaction Clomipramine HCl Sildenafil Citrate Healthy Males
DOC.detailed_description: Clomipramine dibenzazepine-derivative tricyclic antidepressant ( TCA ) potent inhibitor serotonin norepinephrine reuptake . Clomipramine may use variety indication . Condencia Tab contain low dose 15mg clomipramine HCl active ingredient , newly approve market treatment premature ejaculation . This study prospective , randomised , open-labeled , 6-sequence , 3-period , 3-treatment , crossover , single-center clinical trial . A total 30 healthy male volunteer enrol randomised one among 6 group ( 5 subject per group ) . The safety PK/PD characteristic co-administration Clomipramine HCl Sildenafil citrate investigate closely compare effect single dose administration .
DOC.criteria: Korean healthy male age 19 65 Body weight 60kg 90kg , BMI 19 27 Given inform consent Clinically significant medical history and/or concurrent disease SBP > =140 mmHg < =90 mmHg , DBP > =95 mmHg < =50 mmHg Orthostatic hypotension Hypersensitivity ingredient investigational drug Severe bleed blood donation within 8 week prior study participation Alcoholism drug abuser Smoking 0.5 packyear Persistent alcohol consumption 21 unit ( 210g ) /week Participation investigational clinical trial
